title: Winter 20/21
albumCredits: Recorded on a cell phone with a couple mics and a handful of instruments during periods of quarantine in 2020, these songs explore struggles and isolation during the COVID-19 global pandemic, political demagoguery, and the ways we look to people, places, dreams, and memories as anchors. Released February 5, 2021. All songs written, performed, and mixed by Good Carver. Mastered by Ed Brooks at Resonant Mastering. © & ℗ 2021 Good Carver. All Rights Reserved.
